Mods.Name: No SleepCooldown
Mods.Author: KolbenLP
Mods.Description: Its simple - Sleep whenever you want!

Mods.Name: Simple GUI Gauge Mod
Mods.Author: xspeedasx
Mods.Description:
This mod adds an analog UI gauge, similar to BeamNG drive and other games.
It is only visible when player is sitting in a car (inside and exterior cameras)

 it was not tested in multiplayers, so keep expectations low 

* Left gauge is fuel (fluid in the tank), 
* Right is temperature (C is 50C/122F, H is 130C/266F)
* Big gauge is RPM (it shows a little bit more than engine's max RPM capability)
* The numbers are Speed (km/h) in the top and Gear in the bottom
* Icons are: left - handbrake, right - lights

Mods.Name: Electric Motors Mod
Mods.Author: xspeedasx
Mods.Description:
This mod adds electric motors to The Long Drive that can be mounted to any vehicle instead of internal combustion engines.

Some useful information:
* There are 5 performance variants, revving from 10,000 (cyan) to 20,000 rpm (red)!
* Its not required, but advisable to add water to both radiator and fuel tank to cool the motor.
* Vehicles won't use any gas, oil or diesel, but there must be something in the tank due to TLD limitations (Genesz pls fix).Changelog:
-Added compatibility with the VeeAyteEnjin a.k.a. Serena's V8
- Improved compatibility with the RUNDENautomatic mod - allows motors to have multiple gears when car is automatic.
- Gave more juice to BUS (400%), IFA (400%) and Fury (150%), but also more heat gain - it's still quite unbalanced and needs more tweaking
- Removed unnecessary shameful code left over from weeks of debugging

* tip: To go forwards in automatic, first set gear lever to R position, reach ~20km/h in reverse and start mashing gears all the way from P to 1 and back few times, until it locks into 1, then choose D and accelerate.

Mods.Name: BeanMG.drive Caravan Mod!
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
This mod adds the caravan from BeamNG into the game :)

There is a bug where caravans that spawn with wheels may disappear when you load! Look for caravans that spawn without wheels

New in version 2.2:
- Caravans have conditions
- Can now be repaired with wire brush
- There is interior noise dampening when inside the caravan
- Caravan interior is physlocked if you have the physlock mod
- The trailer hitch stand thing now works and can be used to lock the trailer in place
- You can actually sit and sleep in the seats!
- The table has collisions for props
- Working water taps !
- More opening panels
- Randomised parts (some caravans don't have AC or don't have the flap on the front)
- The caravan can be broken! (It'll fall to a billion pieces if you crash insanely hard)

Mods.Name: SpawnerTLD Pause Menu
Mods.Author: FreakShow
Mods.Description:
You can spawn cars anywhere 
First mod with GUI 
"Distance driven" must be over 1000km then mod start working

Shows up in the ESC Menu
Also, in Dev tools you can enable  to delete objects....

Mods.Name: Eternal day time
Mods.Author: Zorkind
Mods.Description:
imagine the planet stopped spinning and that caused the apocalypses heheh or whatever

Might spawn 99999 UFO's or something. Have fun! Its a bug

 If its still turns night, reload your save. Its a bug too

Mods.Name: Diesel V8 Engine
Mods.Author: NICULL /Thanks to xspeedasx
Mods.Description:
The Diesel V8 mod, is an edit of the diesel cars mod by Ghaleas and Runden.
 I was given permission by them to use some of the code to make this diesel version of the brand new V8 in the game.

-It idles at 700 rpm and it maxes out at 5250 rpm with a top speed of 170 - 185 kmh
-If you use it in the ifa truck it can go up to 215 kmh 
-Increased oil capacity to 7.5L
-Increased oil consumption

Currently it does not more torque than the gas engine because i don't know how to do that yet but maybe in a later update.

1.3.1 version Changelog:
-Fixed loading save bug, no longer converts your gas engine to this diesel one.
-Updated colors, it's slightly lighter now with more.. chrome.
-Completely different torquecurve compared to the gas fury engine
-7.5L Oil capacity
-850Nm of torque at 3000Rpm!

Mods.Name: Hardcore Mod
Mods.Author: NICULL & RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
Changelog:
-Gas, diesel, oil consumption is increased. (Diesel is still more efficient than gas but not as much)
-Water Consumption is increased by 5x
-Radiators are 30% less efficient
-You can now loose gears if you don't shift properly
-Street lights spawn on random sides of the road, some are leaning and some flicker.
-Every fluid you spawn with, even you hunger and health is now halved at the start of the game
-Maximum operating temperatures of engines is now 125 Degrees Celsius (or 257 fahrenheit)
-Starting chance of cars is lowered
-Fixed losing fluids really fast bug

Mods.Name: Spoilers for Golf
Mods.Author: NICULL
Mods.Description:
Self explaining.

Adds nice spoilers for the Golf!

unlike popular belief no it does not add 42069 horsepower. It's just the dacia spoiler on the golf hatch trunk.

Mods.Name: Dacia 1300 Break
Mods.Author: Tumpy_Noodles / RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
Dacia Kombi/Wagon!!!! v1.0
Shares parts with normal Dacia except trunk. 
Available in automatic and RHD with manuals being a 5 speed. 
Rear seat is completely removable and it will snap in the right spot when placed near it by just letting go.  

Known Issues:
1. Newly spawned Dacias and Dacia Kombis such as starting car, ai cars, and spawner cars might have the wrong trunk attached. It should be fixed by saving and loading. Naturally spawning cars shouldn't do this.
2. License plate will rotate downward when reloaded. You can unattach it and reattach it to correct it.
3. The car will sometimes clip into the ground and suddenly stop, registering as a crash. The normal Dacia does this and is a problem with the base game. The Dacia Kombi has some steps done to mitigate this but it will still happen on rough terrain.
4. Baskets and possibly other things attached to the back seat will coerge towards the middle of the seat. This is a byproduct of the seat being removeable.

Mods.Name: Updated Iron sights Mod
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
This is the version of the mod that works in the current version game version. 
This update was posted by Runden, the original author is not in the server anymore.

Mods.Name: V8 Gas Engine
Mods.Author: Serena
Mods.Description:
A powerful V8 engine that comes in varying sizes, from 4.6L to 7.2L! Bigger engine = more power, but also more fuel consumption.

Important notes:
You'll have a 25% chance to find this engine as a Lada 2101/2102 engine replacement, so it's a bit rare.
Turbo's can work but may actually make the engine perform worse, use at your own risk!

Sound volume now conforms to the ingame slider and turbo's no longer become

Mods.Name: Extra foods mod
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description: Silly mod which adds a bunch more food items to the game which you can eat!

Mods.Name: Exploding Cacti In TLD
Mods.Author: coolgamer553
Mods.Description: When Crashing Into Cacti They Now Explode, Its Pretty Self Explaining, Just Crash Into Cacti See What Happens!

Mods.Name: Custom AutoSave Interavall
Mods.Author: KolbenLP
Mods.Description:
You can set an custom Autosave Interval, by opening the GUI with F8! The GUI is pretty self explaining. Press - to lower the interval, press + to higher it. Press Save to Save the interval, so its the same if you restart the game. 

Press F6 to Trigger an Autosave automatically. 
NOTE: Autosave has to be enabled in the Settings in order for it to work!

Mods.Name: Additional Rims
Mods.Author: Serena
Mods.Description: This mod adds 9 new car rims, bringing the total of car rims to choose from to 10, it also adds 2 new bus/truck rims made to be used together, shallow for the front axle, deep for the rear axle! They spawn mostly random, so finding a full set of desired rims could become a fun little scavenger hunt!

Mods.Name: Hyperzine 2.0
Mods.Author: KolbenLP
Mods.Description:
Pour this light blue liquid in your Gas/Diesel Tank, ca. 30% Hyperzine 2.0 and the rest Diesel or Gas. Your Car will run much faster now (ca. 250kmh+)! Beware tho. if you pour too much of it in the gas tank, the car will have no idle and runs not so good.
You will find a big barrel of hyperzine in your basement in the starter house. And it will also spawn naturally.
Original mod by Splendid

Mods.Name: Physlock For All Cars
Mods.Author: Serena
Mods.Description:
Car interiors, including trunks and the pickup bed, will now have the physics lock functionality applied to them! This effect only applies to CARS, so the IFA and the buses are excluded.
Note that it may sometimes lock items on the exterior of some of the vehicles as well due to technical limitations.

Mods.Name: Gutted Ikarus
Mods.Author: Serena
Mods.Description:
This removes the whole interior of the Ikarus 260 & 280 buses and adds physlock to the entire interior space, allowing you to store or build whatever you want inside of the buses without it being able to move!
Due to how this mod was made, the button under the front bumper is now invisible, but it is still there and can still be used to open the door.

Mods.Name: Randomly Sized Baskets
Mods.Author: Serena
Mods.Description: This changes the baskets to spawn at a random size, from tiny to IFA flatbed sized! Carry large amounts of items with ease on any car! Note that this random size means the Ebatta will no longer spawn with a basket attached.

Mods.Name: AI Traffic
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
It's the two way traffic update, get ready for head on collisions

Adds other cars as traffic on the roads, who drive along with you! You can adjust the spawn rate in the settings menu, or press F11 to force an AI car to spawn

Mods.Name: DropCamTweak
Mods.Author: user-m89o8bivor
Mods.Description: DropCam is a "Hidden Camera" that initially spawns exactly where your in-game camera is. This mod tweaks the way it behaves depending on which keys you hold before enabling it

Mods.Name: Physics Lock for Cargo IFA
Mods.Author: Rostik
Mods.Description: Uses the basket's physics lock on the katona variant of the IFA. Items inside will stay in place now :)

Mods.Name: Random Horn
Mods.Author: Ghaleas
Mods.Description: Randomises the horns in all cars

Mods.Name: Diesel Swap Mod
Mods.Author: Ghaleas, Runden,NICULL
Mods.Description:
Dacia and Lada Riva can now spawn diesel engines. These can also be found in the wild (they have more power and less RPMs)

1.2 version Changelog:
- Fixed loading save bug, no longer converts your gas engine to this diesel one.
-Fixed the bug where they used the default torque of the gas engines. (Ghaleas used maxNm instead of torqueCurve)
-Diesel 2105 engine now has 135Nm of torque at 4000Rpm.
-Diesel Dacia engine now has 105nm of torque at 4500Rpm. (which is what Ghaleas originally intended)
-Updated colors, dacia engine is slightly lighter and 2105 engine is slightly darker.

Big thanks to xspeedasx for helping with the code and Ghaleas for allowing me to continue his work!

Mods.Name: Radiator slot for Trabant
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description: This mod adds a functioning radiator slot to the trabant! Put a radiator where the front bumper would go. The radiator is held on by glue, it will fall off easy!

Mods.Name: Tire Wear
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
DISCLAIMER: THIS MOD IS BUGGY AND CAN CAUSE YOUR CAR TO BEHAVE VERY WEIRDLY AND GLITCH OUT!

This mod makes your wheels wear down as you drive along, doing burnouts and skidding sideways will tear up your wheels until they pop!

Make sure to bring a spare tire!!

Update to Tire Wear mod, updated to version 1.8 :)
Now tyres will no longer get worn by being in the air
Large bus/truck tyres get worn more slowly and are much more usable
when tyres are skidding, you will loose control a bit more so you can drift a bit more easily :)

Mods.Name: Temperature Gauge Mod
Mods.Author: Ghaleas, Runden
Mods.Description: Find-able temperature gauges. Now you'll know how hot a turbo Trabant can get! The gauges aren't precise but let's face it, it's 1979's soviet engineering.

Mods.Name: Ducktail Spoiler for ladas
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
A little plastic ducktail spoiler for the boot lid of your ladas :)
Supports 2101 and 2105
1 in 2 chance of spawning!

Mods.Name: Turbo Mod
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description: Adds turbochargers as loot from buildings, which you can mount to any engine, and get a nice power boost! USE MANUAL, AUTO SHIFT DOESN'T REV ENOUGH.

Mods.Name: EngineTuner (NOT RECOMMENDED)
Mods.Author: ELS
Mods.Description:
WARNING! THIS MOD MIGHT BREAK YOUR SAVE! MAKE A BACKUP! 
This mod allows you to change the engine torque curve, max rpm, gear ratios, drivetype, suspension stiffness, tire grip, ride height, and much more! (F3) to open

Mods.Name: TLD Toolset
Mods.Author: ELS
Mods.Description:
This mod allows you to look up, edit, and mess around with objects in the game, and their components! 
(Ctrl + Z) to open

Mods.Name: Tachometers Mod
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
Adds aftermarket tachometers you can find as loot, and mount to your car (almost) wherever you like!
There's 8 different tachometers to find, and two variations of each.

Mods.Name: CarInfotainmentText
Mods.Author: ELS
Mods.Description:
This mod adds an in-game menu that shows various information about the car you're driving (see picture logo).
note: only works when in-car ofc
(F2) to open

Mods.Name: VAZ 2104 (Riva Estate)
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description: This adds the estate version of the legendary lada 2105! This is lada model 2104. It has so much cargo space :)

Mods.Name: Improved Handbrakes
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
Fixes the handbrakes so they behave like real life.
You can now do handbrake turns!
You can enabled arcade style control in the pause menu.

Mods.Name: cum
Mods.Author: Locke
Mods.Description:
Cum.
Mash the C button to cum.

Cars now run on cum

Mods.Name: Remove Rocks From Road
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description: This mod removes all those annoying rocks that spawn on the road. No more crashing into a rock that just popped in!

Mods.Name: Elon Musk
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
it's elon musk.

DEL key spawns / removes musk
Right-Shift makes him look at you
Alt-Gr makes him follow you

Mods.Name: Right-Hand-Drive Cars
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
Adds RHD (right hand drive) cars to the game! Some have 5 speed gearbox, tachometer slots, and other upgrades! The cars should spawn randomly as loot parked at buildings

Glovebox fixed on 2101&2102, and 2102 has a proper revering light

Mods.Name: MPH Mod
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description: Changes all the guages in cars to read in MPH instead of KMH! Good for America and UK people lol.

Mods.Name: Playable Piano
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
Adds a piano as loot you can find!

You can press E on the keys to play it!
(Press ESC to stop playing)

Mods.Name: Mount Anywhere Mod
Mods.Author: RUNDEN, Ghaleas
Mods.Description:
Mount anywhere mod has been altered to function again after the most recent update, however the behavior is now slightly different, to mount items in different slots, hold F and let the bar fill and then drain completely, then release F again.

Credits go to Ghaleas for the fix, credits for the original mod go to Runden

Mods.Name: SpawnerTLD
Mods.Author: _RainBowSheep_
Mods.Description:
You can spawn cars anywhere 
First mod with GUI 
"Distance driven" must be over 1000km then mod start working 
Show/Hide - Insert

Mods.Name: RundenPhysicsGun
Mods.Author: RUNDEN
Mods.Description:
This is the REAL physics gun mod lol. 
First modloader mod that supports saving / loading! 
Physics gun will spawn naturally as loot

Mods.Name: BetterCrates
Mods.Author: _RainBowSheep_
Mods.Description:
First mod with a complete replacement of the item. 
This mod replaces all old crates on new crushable crates. You can find loot in the crates. 
Spawn Crate - Numpad 1

Mods.Name: Push Harder
Mods.Author: KolbenLP
Mods.Description:
You can basicly push your cars faster. 
Pushing strengh is veri high now

Mods.Name: FastPedal
Mods.Author: KolbenLP
Mods.Description: With this mod you can pedal really fast with your bike xD (press shift for even faster pedalling)
